com.cyc.query

Interface ProofViewSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QueryAnswerExplanationSpecification<ProofView>

    public interface ProofViewSpecification
extends QueryAnswerExplanationSpecification<ProofView>
    The configuration parameters which determine how a ProofView should be generated.
